alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:11PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake of the Woods County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Angle Inlet, or 41 miles northeast of Roseau, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Long Point, Lude and Arnesen around 1140 PM CDT. Birch Beach around 1145 PM CDT. Wheelers Point and Williams around 1200 AM CDT. Graceton around 1210 AM CDT. Pitt and Baudette around 1215 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
